data.comment: Today's referee, Peter Bankes, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Sheffield at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Brighton.
Throw-in for Sheffield in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Brighton.
Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 9, Peter Bankes awards Brighton a goal kick.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Lewis Dunk (Brighton) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the away team in Falmer.
Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
John Lundstram of Sheffield smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sheffield's Rhian Brewster has run offside.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Brighton just outside Sheffield's area.
In the minute 16, Brighton to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
Sheffield will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Brighton.
Peter Bankes awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Sheffield.
Brighton's Adam Lallana gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sheffield defender.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 21, Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Sheffield.
In the minute 23, Peter Bankes waits before resuming play because Neal Maupay for Brighton is still down.
Brightonâ€™s Neal Maupay is on his feet again at American Express Community Stadium.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
In the minute 25, Throw-in Sheffield.
Brighton's Neal Maupay is on target but unsuccessful.
Peter Bankes signals a Brighton throw-in in Sheffield's half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Brighton in the half of Sheffield.
Sheffield needs to be cautious. Brighton have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in high up the field for Brighton in Falmer.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In the minute 31, In Falmer, Neal Maupay of Brighton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Important block from the Sheffield defence as Neal Maupay fires in a strike for Brighton.
Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 33, The away team have replaced John Fleck with Oliver Burke. This is the first substitution made today by Chris Wilder.
Lewis Dunk (Brighton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 35, Sheffield drives forward and David McGoldrick gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sheffield at American Express Community Stadium.
Throw-in for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Brighton.
The match at American Express Community Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Adam Lallana, who is down injured.
In the minute 40, Sheffield are down to 10 men after John Lundstram has been shown a red card.
Peter Bankes signals a throw-in for Brighton, close to Sheffield's area.
In Falmer, Aaron Connolly (Brighton) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 42, Sheffield have a goal kick.
Adam Lallana is back on his feet again.
Throw-in Brighton.
In the minute 43, Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Sheffield at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 45, Can Sheffield capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brighton's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Falmer.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Sheffield at American Express Community Stadium.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, Peter Bankes has blown to start the second-half.
Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 46, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Alireza Jahanbakhsh is on a sub for Joel Veltman for Brighton.
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Sheffield.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Aaron Connolly of Brighton is pulled up for offside.
Brighton's Leandro Trossard gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
Solly March (Brighton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Peter Bankes signals a Brighton throw-in in Sheffield's half.
In the minute 54, Chris Wilder is making the team's second substitution at American Express Community Stadium with Jayden Bogle replacing Rhian Brewster.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Sheffield's Enda Stevens misses with an attempt on goal.
Peter Bankes awards Brighton a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Jayden Bogle.
In the minute 63, That's a fine assist from David McGoldrick.
Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
Brighton's Adam Webster gets in a shot on goal at American Express Community Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 66, Danny Welbeck is replacing Neal Maupay for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Yves Bissouma (Brighton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 69, Sheffield have a goal kick.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
The away team replace David McGoldrick with Ben Osborn.
In the minute 70, David McGoldrick for Sheffield has been booked by Peter Bankes and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 72, Graham Potter (Brighton) is making a third substitution, with Andi Zeqiri replacing Ben White.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Adam Webster (Brighton) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Sheffield at American Express Community Stadium.
Brighton push forward at American Express Community Stadium and Andi Zeqiri gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sheffield defence.
Throw-in for Sheffield at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 76, Sheffield's George Baldock is whistled for offside at American Express Community Stadium.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In the minute 78, Important block from the Sheffield defence as Solly March fires in a strike for Brighton.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Brighton push upfield and Adam Webster gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Sheffield defence.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Brighton.
Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Sheffield.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brighton to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
Brighton attack but Aaron Connolly's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the away team in Falmer.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Aaron Ramsdale for Sheffield who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Oliver Burke of Sheffield gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 84, Peter Bankes awards Brighton a goal kick.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Brighton surge into the attack at American Express Community Stadium but Andi Zeqiriâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 85, Peter Bankes awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Brighton.
Ben Osborn (Sheffield) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 87, Aaron Ramsdale for Sheffield is back on the field again.
Goal! Brighton go level at 1-1 through Danny Welbeck in Falmer.
In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 88, Oliver Burke (Sheffield) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
In Falmer Brighton attack through Leandro Trossard. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
Peter Bankes signals a Sheffield throw-in in Brighton's half.
At American Express Community Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
Free kick in a good position for Sheffield!
Can Sheffield capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Brighton.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Falmer.
Danny Welbeck for Brighton drives towards goal at American Express Community Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Brighton drive upfield and Lewis Dunk gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sheffield defender.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Andi Zeqiri (Brighton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
The match has come to a close in Falmer. The final score is 1-1.
Sheffield's Aaron Ramsdale has been booked in Falmer.
At American Express Community Stadium, Chris Basham has been yellow-carded for the away team.
